name: Cybertext
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/ZN8WAePLxyogouwg6

Benjamin has gone bankrupt and he needs to settle his debt as soon as possible. One day, he entered a competition that promised a big prize to anyone who won the competition. By participating in the competition, he hopes to win the competition so that the bank will no longer look for him. Now, all he needs to do is...RUN! 🏃
